pageTitle: Shot Glass Raid Frames : Raid Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (2) Bug Fix: Certain events reset the attributes of the unit frame, breaking the link. This update will restore those links when attributes are changed. 0.3: Clique Support, Bug fixes, Incoming Heals. 0.4-0.8: Added Vehicle Support, Spell Priority, External Configuration for Auras. 0.9: Bug Fix: Priority Bug. 0.10: Implemented slash-commands. See readme.txt for a list of commands. 1.11: Integrated ShotGlass_Priest. Bug Fix: Priority bug. 1.12: Merely a TOC bump for 4.1 1.13: DUH! When you bump the TOC, then you should do it correctly. /facepalm 1.14: Merely a TOC bump for 4.2 1.15: - Removed slash commands, except for /shotglass (which will bring up the new interface panel) + Added quick link to interface panel, via right-click on the drag handle + Added GUI Interface panel + Auras will display a countdown from 5 seconds (it will replace stack-count text, temporarily) + TOC Bump for 4.3 2.0: - Trying to fix the overlap bug.
